医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
咖啡和烟草中的生物活性化合物可以对抗帕金森病烟草和咖啡含有生物活性化合物，可以通过针对 MAO B 抑制、α-突触核蛋白聚集和神经炎症等关键途径来降低帕金森病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Bioactive-compounds-in-coffee-and-tobacco-may-combat-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Bioactive-compounds-in-coffee-and-tobacco-may-combat-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e7f89d3-1599-41e3-9e8b-295e393445b4 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 23:15:00 -0500 Bioactive compounds in coffee and tobacco may combat Parkinson’s disease
美国废水处理未能解决日益严重的有机氟污染问题城市废水处理厂去除的可萃取有机氟不到 25%，其中氟化药物是主要污染物，对美国饮用水质量构成重大风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/US-wastewater-treatment-fails-to-address-rising-organofluine-contamination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/US-wastewater-treatment-fails-to-address-rising-organofluine-contamination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0942cc03-74a0-40f8-848b-4c50ec748c7d Tue, 07 Jan 2025 22:59:00 -0500 U.S. wastewater treatment fails to address rising organofluorine contamination
氟化物会影响智商吗？研究指出风险但提出问题尽管发现氟化物暴露与智商较低之间存在联系，但该研究的缺陷引发了质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Can-fluide-affect-IQ-Study-points-to-risks-but-raises-questions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Can-fluide-affect-IQ-Study-points-to-risks-but-raises-questions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64d2698a-44d8-47ba-b232-169aa6daf45e Tue, 07 Jan 2025 22:40:00 -0500 Can fluoride affect IQ? Study points to risks but raises questions
研究强调对儿童和青少年的心理健康支持存在延迟一项新的研究表明，有较高心理健康需求的儿童和青少年正在努力获得他们需要的帮助，或者让他们的困难得到承认。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Study-highlights-delays-in-mental-health-support-for-children-and-young-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Study-highlights-delays-in-mental-health-support-for-children-and-young-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0df409a4-aba4-44d3-9ea1-06b284c810dd Tue, 07 Jan 2025 22:19:42 -0500 Study highlights delays in mental health support for children and young people
研究显示成人娱乐性氯胺酮使用量显着增加最近的一项研究分析了全国药物使用与健康调查 (NSDUH) 的数据，发现自 2015 年以来，过去一年中成年人的娱乐性氯胺酮使用量急剧增加，其中与抑郁症以及种族、年龄和教育等社会人口特征的关联发生了显着变化地位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Study-reveals-significant-increase-in-recreational-ketamine-use-among-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Study-reveals-significant-increase-in-recreational-ketamine-use-among-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ec3e8a8-e1cd-494b-87c6-a83de13548c1 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 22:11:29 -0500 Study reveals significant increase in recreational ketamine use among adults
加州大学洛杉矶分校启动项目帮助自闭症成年人应对约会爱情没有指导手册，但对于寻求应对浪漫复杂性的自闭症成年人来说，加州大学洛杉矶分校健康项目通过启动一项名为“同龄人约会”的新研究，提供了寻找和维持有意义的关系的路线图。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/UCLA-launches-program-to-help-autistic-adults-navigate-dating.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/UCLA-launches-program-to-help-autistic-adults-navigate-dating.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a18c80c9-a328-416d-8890-a59fa9b0f19d Tue, 07 Jan 2025 22:09:28 -0500
确定改善 TBI 患者急性后护理的关键行动一项新的系统文献检索确定了旨在改善非住院创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 急性后护理的最高优先级临床行动。该研究发表在同行评审的《神经创伤杂志》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Key-actions-identified-to-improve-post-acute-care-for-TBI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Key-actions-identified-to-improve-post-acute-care-for-TBI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8454e7da-e53f-4d18-804e-a6066dd13794 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 22:05:53 -0500 Key actions identified to improve post-acute care for TBI patients
研究人员通过保护涂层延长神经植入物的寿命神经植入物包含基于硅的集成电路 (IC)（通常称为芯片）。这些植入物需要小而灵活，以模仿人体内的环境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Researchers-enhance-longevity-of-neural-implants-with-protective-coating.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Researchers-enhance-longevity-of-neural-implants-with-protective-coating.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11eb18ba-68bf-4115-9026-92a478375d08 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 22:03:57 -0500 Researchers enhance longevity of neural implants with protective coating
事实证明，乳腺癌的早期检测对于加拿大的医疗保健系统来说具有成本效益癌症筛查是挽救患者生命的关键，因为早期诊断可以提高生存率、降低发病率并减少强化治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Early-detection-of-breast-cancer-proven-cost-efficient-for-Canadas-health-care-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/Early-detection-of-breast-cancer-proven-cost-efficient-for-Canadas-health-care-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea7dda06-c07e-4ba8-a486-8ff1f4bf7bfe Tue, 07 Jan 2025 21:58:21 -0500 Early detection of breast cancer proven cost-effective for Canada's health care system
基于人工智能的方法预测自身免疫性疾病的进展自身免疫性疾病是指免疫系统错误地攻击人体自身的健康细胞和组织，在诊断前通常有一个临床前阶段，其特征是轻微症状或血液中存在某些抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/AI-based-method-predicts-progression-of-autoimmune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250107/AI-based-method-predicts-progression-of-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf86f012-63ad-4ab3-8718-056c94686721 Tue, 07 Jan 2025 21:55:37 -0500 AI-based method predicts progression of autoimmune diseases
